title: Grieved Souls Anthology: The Bloody Dress - Novel Updates
genre: Horror   Mature   Mystery   Psychological   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Abusive Characters   Adopted Children   Arrogant Characters   Child Abuse   Collection of Short Stories   Complex Family Relationships   Ghosts   Incest   Jealousy   Male Yandere   Murders   Obsessive Love   Past Trauma   R-15   Romantic Subplot   S*xual Abuse
author: Dhieya Adlynna   Isha Idiaz   Maria Kajiwa   Zakri Rahman
description:
A grieving soul is filled with mysteries, traumas, scares, and horrors. A compilation of short stories told from the perspective of those souls, unhinged, as they quench their thirst for blood. Beware as the stories might haunt you, even in your sleep. 

A book containing multiple short stories with disturbing themes and topics. Written by Malaysian writers, with various styles of story-telling and narration. It’s sure to get the readers fascinated with each writer’s weirdly-build world of imagination. >
